widgets.title: Hosts Monitored
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(`label.environment`), latest(apmApplicationNames) FROM NETCLRMemory FACET hostname SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Time in GC by Service - Top Offenders
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(PercentTimeinGC) FROM NETCLRMemory FACET Name SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 20

widgets.title: Time Spent in GC by Service
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(PercentTimeinGC),latest(`label.environment`) FROM NETCLRMemory FACET Name SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Time in GC by Service, Node
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(PercentTimeinGC) FROM NETCLRMemory FACET Name,hostname  SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Violations
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(criticalViolationCount), latest(warningViolationCount) FROM NETCLRMemory SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Total Heap Size (GB)
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(NumberBytesinallHeaps)/1000000000 FROM NETCLRMemory FACET hostname SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: % of Time in GC
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(PercentTimeinGC) FROM NETCLRMemory SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Number of Induced GCs
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(NumberInducedGC) FROM NETCLRMemory facet hostname SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Committed vs. Reserved (GB)
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(NumberTotalcommittedBytes)/1000000000 as 'Committed', average(NumberTotalreservedBytes)/1000000000 as 'Reserved' FROM NETCLRMemory SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Gen 0 Heapsize
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(Gen0heapsize)/1000000000 FROM NETCLRMemory FACET hostname SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Collection Count
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(NumberGen0Collections) as 'Gen 0', latest(NumberGen1Collections) as 'Gen 1 ', latest(NumberGen2Collections) as 'Gen 2' FROM NETCLRMemory since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Gen 2 Heapsize
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(Gen2heapsize)/1000000000 FROM NETCLRMemory facet hostname SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: DTU Consumption
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(`dtuConsumptionPercent.Average`) FROM AzureSqlDatabaseSample WHERE providerAccountId = '7483' TIMESERIES AUTO FACET displayName

widgets.title: Gen 1 Heapsize
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(Gen1heapsize)/1000000000 FROM NETCLRMemory FACET hostname SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Large Object Heapsize
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(LargeObjectHeapsize)/1000000000 FROM NETCLRMemory FACET hostname SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
